text:
Noami Santos-Lamb (born 29 November 1993) is a Puerto Rican female volleyball player. She was part of the Puerto Rico women's national volleyball team at the 2010 FIVB World Championship, 2016 FIVB World Grand Prix, 2017 FIVB Volleyball World Grand Prix, and 2018 FIVB Volleyball Women's World Championship.
She played for the University of Florida's women's volleyball. and San Juan.
